humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that the left breast has an invasive ductal carcinoma measuring 6.0 x 4.0 x 3.5 cm in size, which falls under the T3 category (T3 tumors are more than 5 cm). The right breast tumor is smaller (1.7 x 1.3 x 1.0 cm) and classified as pT1c, but the T stage is determined by the largest tumor. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage is defined by the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the pathologic size of the left breast tumor is 6.0 x 4.0 x 3.5 cm, which falls in the T3 category (T3: tumor size >5 cm). The right breast tumor is smaller (1.7 x 1.3 x 1.0 cm) and falls in the T1 category, but the T stage is determined by the largest tumor. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T3.
